page.title: 14Clovelly - local comments
page.content: Local adults were asked for their comments on living in Clovelly. Most of them were favourable with only a few listing the drawbacks. Comments include:- {"I like living in Clovelly}because its near the sea and its got nice walks". "...because its a happy place to live" "...because the people are friendly". "...I was born and grew up here". "...its nice and peaceful here especially in the winter". "...its nice to live in a famous village with its original character". "...I have lovely views from my window "...its the best place in the world and not like anywhere else". "...its far from towns and cities". {"I don't like living in Clovelly because of the wind,its too remote and of all the visitors". "Its too dark,damp & depressing for me".
